Actions.Name: Noxious Garden
Actions.Description: The [name] creates up to two mushroom summons in range.

Summons.Name: Mushroom
Summons.SummonEffects: When a character collides with a mushroom, it explodes for a small blast blast area effect. Characters inside must save or become pacified, then take [D]+[fray] piercing damage, or just [fray] damage on a successful save. The character that collided automatically fails the save.
